title: The Truth about Porn Star Boyfriends
description: I guess I just forgot. To ask him what he did for a living, I mean. By the time I did, I was inâ€”deep. He was the perfect boyfriend. Attentive, gorgeous, guessing my every wish and fulfilling them. The sex was earth-shattering. He even dealt with my crazy mom the way no one else could. He popped the question, God, such a perfect guy. There was just one issue: He slept with other girls on camera for a living. How the heck do you deal with that?
author: Sunniva Dee
